text: Josef Augusta (24 November 1946 - 16 February 2017) was a Czechoslovak ice hockey player and coach. He won a silver medal at the 1976 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck, Austria. He later was head coach of Czech national hockey team at the 2002 Winter Olympics in Salt Lake City, Utah, United States. He was the father of Patrik Augusta. He was born in Havlíčkův Brod. Augusta died from pancreatic cancer on 16 February 2017 in Jihlava, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Ice hockey coaches Category:Czech ice hockey players Category:Czechoslovak ice hockey players Category:Olympic silver medalists for Czechoslovakia Category:Competitors at the 1976 Winter Olympics
title: Josef Augusta (ice hockey)
